resources.string:
To proceed to the next screen, press and hold the LOWER-LEFT button on the watch for 3 seconds. After the second double-beep, the app will display the time-setting screen.

Make sure the official Casio app is not running, as it will interfere with this app.

To run Actions defined in the Actions screen, short-press the LOWER-RIGHT button. Actions are apps on your phone, like Take a photo. Using actions, the watch acts like a remote control for your phone.

The B5600/B5000/B2100 watches have 5 alarms and a "signal" (hourly chime) settings shown here. The alarms can be updated by pressing on the time value of each alarm. A new dialog will appear, which allows you to set the alarm\'s time. Once the alarms have been set, you can send them to the watch, or send them to the Alarm Clock app on the phone.

This screen displays Events from your Google Calendar and allows you to send them to the watch\'s reminders.\n\nIf no events appear, make sure you have future events, or non-expired repeating events in your Google calendar.
The selected actions are run when the user short-presses the LOWER-RIGHT watch button from the initial screen. With these actions, the watch acts as a remote control for your phone.

The auto-fill values are derived as follows:
  • Time/Date format and Language, are obtained from the Phone\'s setting.
  • Button tone is turned OFF if the phone is in DnD mode, ON otherwise.
  • Power Saving will be set to ON if the battery\'s level is at 15% or less.
    • Note: The values will not change until sent again, even if the conditions change (i.e DnD is turned ON/OFF)

Home Time shows the watch\'s time zone. When the app sets the watch\'s time (either manually or automatically), it will also set the Home Time, Time Offset and DST (if applicable) to the current time zone. So there is no need for swapping your World Time and Home Time when travelling to another timezone.

• Time Adjustment setting enables the App to automatically update the watch\'s time 4 times per day.
  • At the same time, the App will update the watch\'s Reminders (Events) from your Google Calendar if the Set Reminders from Google Calendar action is enabled

• By default, the app will try to connect to a previously connected watch. If you like to connect to a different watch, press the FORGET button, and then connect the new watch as usual. From then on, the app will try to connect to this new watch.
  • The app will auto-detect the model of the watch.

• Automatic time adjustment occurs 4 times per day, sometime after the hours of 12:00AM, 6:00AM, 12:00PM and 6:00PM.
  • This setting sets the number of minutes after the hour when time adjustment occurs. So if you set this value to 25, time adjustment will happen at 12:25AM, 6:25AM, 12:25PM and 6:25PM.
  • If you have multiple watches, you can control when to set their time individually.
If you are playing music or a video in a media player such as Spotify, YouTube, or YTMusic on your phone, this action will skip to the next song or video. It also works with Android Auto

• This action will set the 5 alarms on the watch to the Muslim prayers Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha times.
  • The times vary based on your location and current date, so for best accuracy, run this action daily. If this action is enabled, the alarms will also be automatically updated during the auto-time adjustment, 4 times per day.
  • The following calculation methods are used, based on your location: NORTH AMERICA, DİYANET, EGYPTIAN, DUBAI, UMM AL QURA, QATAR, SINGAPORE, KUWAIT and MUSLIM WORLD LEAGUE everywhere else.
  • For suggestions and corrections contact izivkov@gmail.com

When selected, all alarms, timers, hourly chimes on the watch will be silenced.
  • When manually turning ON/OFF, the DnD will take effect after the Send to Watch button is pressed.<\li>
  • When mirroring, it will take effect immediately upon changing the DnD setting on the phone, no matter what screen you are in currently.<\li>
Maximum number of reminders reached, Please disable some before selecting new ones"

When setting the time, some watch models may display a time that is slightly off by a few seconds. This setting allows you to fine-tune the time adjustment. The value, in milliseconds, is added to the time sent from the app to the watch. You can set values between -5000 and 5000. For example, if your watch is 2.5 seconds ahead of the actual time, set this value to -2500 to sync it accurately.
